A modern, clean website design for an eco-cosmetics brand, featuring a soft color palette of milky white, gentle green, beige, and hints of gold, showcasing skin type filters, product reviews, an ingredients and certifications section, a newsletter subscription, and a quick order option, with minimal text and abundant visuals, avoiding stock images of smiling people, aimed at urban women aged 25-40 interested in natural skincare, across pages like Home, Catalog, Product Card, Cart, Checkout, Blog, About Us, and Contacts, all in a minimalist style with plenty of white space.
